name: check
description: Run a manual check of today's LeetCode challenge status

name: adduser
description: Add a LeetCode username to track

options.name: username
options.description: The LeetCode username to add

options.name: discord_user
options.description: The Discord user to associate with this LeetCode account

name: removeuser
description: Remove a LeetCode username from tracking

options.name: username
options.description: The LeetCode username to remove

name: listusers
description: List all tracked LeetCode usernames

name: setchannel
description: Set the announcement channel for this server

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to send announcements to

name: setadminrole
description: Set the Admin role required for configuration commands

options.name: role
options.description: The role to designate as bot admin

name: togglebroadcast
description: Toggle system broadcasts on or off for this server (Server Owner only)

name: managecron
description: Manage cron schedules for LeetCode checks

options.name: add
options.description: Add a new check time

options.name: hours
options.description: Hour in 24H format (0-23)

options.name: minutes
options.description: Minutes (0-59)

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove an existing check time

options.name: time
options.description: Select a scheduled time to remove

options.name: list
options.description: List all scheduled check times

name: leetstats
description: View LeetCode statistics

options.name: show_all
options.description: Show stats for all registered members (default: your own stats)

name: config
description: Show this server's LeetCode bot configuration

name: calendar
description: Show recent LeetCode activity as a compact calendar

options.name: range
options.description: Number of days to show

options.name: username
options.description: LeetCode username to view (defaults to you)

name: leaderboard
description: Show a LeetCode leaderboard for this server

options.name: period
options.description: Time window for the leaderboard

options.name: metric
options.description: Metric to rank users by

options.name: ephemeral
options.description: Show leaderboard only to you (default: false)

name: botinfo
description: Display information about the bot and its GitHub repository

name: help
description: Display all available commands and their usage

name: telegram
description: Manage Telegram notifications

options.name: connect
options.description: Link your Telegram account to receive notifications

options.name: toggle
options.description: Enable or disable Telegram notifications

options.name: status
options.description: Check your Telegram connection status

name: daily
description: Check daily challenge submission status

options.name: username
options.description: LeetCode username to check (defaults to you)

name: forcecheck
description: Manually trigger the daily check for this server (Admin only)

name: broadcast
description: Broadcast a message to all guilds

options.name: type
options.description: Type of broadcast

name: hc
description: Healthchecks.io monitoring commands

options.name: overview
options.description: Show overview of all monitored checks

options.name: info
options.description: Get detailed information about a specific check

options.name: check
options.description: Name or slug of the check

options.name: history
options.description: View recent pings for a check

options.name: check
options.description: Name or slug of the check

options.name: limit
options.description: Number of recent pings to show (default: 10)

options.name: flips
options.description: View status changes for a check

options.name: check
options.description: Name or slug of the check

options.name: days
options.description: Show flips from last N days (default: 7)

name: togglecontestreminder
description: Enable or disable LeetCode contest reminders for this server

name: contest
description: Show details of the next LeetCode contest
